Class GenericDataSource<T extends org.apache.flink.api.common.io.InputFormat<org.apache.flink.types.Record,?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of input format invoked by instances of this data source.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.flink.util.Visitable<org.apache.flink.api.common.operators.Operator<?>>

    public class GenericDataSource<T extends org.apache.flink.api.common.io.InputFormat<org.apache.flink.types.Record,?>>
extends org.apache.flink.api.common.operators.base.GenericDataSourceBase<org.apache.flink.types.Record,T>
    Abstract superclass for data sources in a Pact plan.
